metadata.title: Purposes of the specified-line detection interrupt (VPOS) and graphic n underflow detection (n = 1, 2) interrupts (GR1UF and GR2UF)

sections.content:
Question:
What are the purposes of the specified-line detection interrupt (VPOS) and graphic n underflow detection (n = 1, 2) interrupts (GR1UF and GR2UF)?
Answer:
Specified-line detection interrupt (VPOS):
This interrupt occurs when the HS (horizontal synchronization) signal of a specified line is asserted.
You can understand the drawing completion timing by specifying the last line of the screen.

Graphic n underflow detection (n = 1,2) interrupts (GR1UF and GR2UF):
These interrupts are used to categorize errors.
  Suitable Products
RX
